body.p: In June 2020, the Board amended IFRS 17 to extend the risk mitigation option in paragraphs B115−B116 of IFRS 17 to apply when an entity uses:

li.p: reinsurance contracts held to mitigate the effect of financial risk on the amount of the entity’s share of the underlying items or the fulfilment cash flows set out in paragraph B113(b) of IFRS 17 (see paragraph BC256B); or

non-derivative financial instruments measured at fair value through profit or loss to mitigate the effect of financial risk on the fulfilment cash flows set out in paragraph B113(b) of IFRS 17 (see paragraph BC256C).
